about_the_game:
Blooming Verdant Chest

This Blooming Verdant Chest contains the third addition to the Verdant skin series.

Includes
  • Willow's Verdant Skin Set
  • Wurt's Verdant Skin Set
  • Wanda's Verdant Skin Set
  • Wickerbottom's Verdant Skin Set
  • Wormwood's Verdant Skin Set
detailed_description:
Blooming Verdant Chest

This Blooming Verdant Chest contains the third addition to the Verdant skin series.

Includes
  • Willow's Verdant Skin Set
  • Wurt's Verdant Skin Set
  • Wanda's Verdant Skin Set
  • Wickerbottom's Verdant Skin Set
  • Wormwood's Verdant Skin Set

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel GMA Graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks
